_comment: Rituals database for The Familiar's Anthology of Empathetic Cycles

ARCHIVIST.setup: record or sample a gesture you've already used in another piece
ARCHIVIST.action: replay it five times, each time changing only your distance to the sound (mic placement, gain staging, room perspective)
ARCHIVIST.prompt: Which version feels closest to memory, and which feels closest to fact?
ARCHIVIST.note: Document the differences as if describing soil strata - colour, density, residue. No adjectives of taste.

MIRROR.function: reveal unacknowledged emotion in the sound
MIRROR.setup: play your most recent unfinished mix quietly enough that you can hear your own breathing over it
MIRROR.action: every time you feel the urge to adjust something, pause and note the body region where the discomfort appears
MIRROR.prompt: What does this sound want from you that you keep declining?
MIRROR.note: do not fix the mix; sit with the transcription of sensations

THERAPIST.setup: open a session that feels overworked or anxious
THERAPIST.action: lower the overall volume until it nearly disappears. Keep listening for five minutes
THERAPIST.prompt: If the track could rest, what would that rest sound like?
THERAPIST.note: The goal is not completion but relief; save the session under a new name ending in '—enough'

TRICKSTER.setup: take a multitrack session and solo the least important or most forgotten stem
TRICKSTER.action: treat that soloed element as the new protagonist; rebuild accompaniment around it
TRICKSTER.prompt: The mistake got here first—can you keep up?
TRICKSTER.note: when done, delete the original master bus and replace it with this version's silence

ORACLE.setup: light, stillness, a single continuous tone
ORACLE.action: write or speak one sentence beginning 'The vessel remembers…' and another 'The residue forgets…'
ORACLE.prompt: When their meanings cross, end the tone
ORACLE.note: archive the recording; mark it as a threshold session. Don't revisit it for seven days

CUSTODIAN.function: establish ritual hygiene before the Work begins
CUSTODIAN.setup: open an old session you never finished. Do not play it yet
CUSTODIAN.action: consolidate all regions, remove empty tracks, rename files by function not by date
CUSTODIAN.prompt: A clean vessel hears more clearly. What was hidden by clutter?
CUSTODIAN.note: Save as a new version with today's date. The act of ordering is the first transformation
